one_reviews_text:
I like the bright colored graphics and the riding in veheles, the music was okay for me because I like Techno and Rock musics.

However it was missing the impact that "Show it 2 me" had which I thought was better; nice catchy music, a pretty (pink) lady (which most guys do like the ladies, fan service), and entertaining (the knives, finger painting and cars .) plenty to do. 

It would be good if Icarus had more interactions because I felt like I was watching an intro opening before the game starts.
Fans of fictional band Dethklok will get a kick out of this brutal offering from Brendon Smalls new album Galaktikon II
If you like heavy metal and seizures this is the game for you if not I would not get it that is why i gave this two stars.

But felt like 30 secs and then autoquit to home.
And why touch only btw? Its pressing 1 button to start and thats all for controls
Not much to it. You can grab the steering but not actually steer, whole thing is over in about 30 seconds.

Other then my title this program is MEH.
Low rent effects based on the old windows media player graphics.
I'm a metal fan but both the music and the visuals were, well...
I love metal music and VR but this was just lame AF.
Push in on your touch joystick on both hands, strap on your HMD tight, turn volume up to 11, and start headbanging.  You're welcome. \m/
The music was nice but this VR experience was way too short and not very entertaining.  After experiencing better VR music experiences like Fantasynth and Show It 2 Me, this was a big letdown.
